addTamedDino: INSERT INTO TamedDinos (id, name, level, health, stamina, oxygen, food, weight, melee, speed, torpor, species, gender, notes, imprint, father, mother, addedBy, tribe, status) VALUES(?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?)
addOrUpdateTamedDino: INSERT INTO TamedDinos (id, name, level, health, stamina, oxygen, food, weight, melee, speed, torpor, species, gender, notes, imprint, father, mother, addedBy, tribe, status) VALUES (?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE name = ?, level = ?, health = ?, stamina = ?, oxygen = ?, food = ?, weight = ?, melee = ?, speed = ?, torpor = ?, species = ?, gender = ?, notes = ?, imprint = ?, father = ?, mother = ?, updatedby = ?, tribe = ?, status =?
getAllTamedDinos: SELECT TamedDinos.*, Users.username FROM TamedDinos LEFT JOIN Users On Users.userId=TamedDinos.addedby
getDinoById: SELECT TamedDinos.*, Users.username FROM TamedDinos LEFT JOIN Users On Users.userId=TamedDinos.addedby WHERE TamedDinos.id = ?
updateTamedDino: UPDATE TamedDinos SET name = ?, level = ?, health = ?, stamina = ?, oxygen = ?, food = ?, weight = ?, melee =?, speed = ?, torpor = ?, species = ?, gender = ?, notes = ?, imprint = ?, father = ?, mother = ?, addedBy = ?, tribe = ? WHERE id = ?
insertUser: INSERT IGNORE INTO Users(userId, username, accessToken, refreshToken) VALUES(?, ?, ?, ?)
updateUser: UPDATE Users SET  username = ?, accessToken = ? WHERE userId = ?
updateUserWithRefresh: UPDATE Users SET username = ?, accessToken = ?, refreshToken = ?, WHERE userId = ?
deleteUserTokens: UPDATE Users SET refreshToken = NULL, accessToken = NULL WHERE userId = ?
getUserTokens: SELECT accessToken, refreshToken FROM Users WHERE userId = ?
getUsersJoinTamedDinos: SELECT Users.username, Users.userId FROM Users INNER JOIN TamedDinos On TamedDinos.addedby=Users.userId
